meanings.sent1: After planting more seeds, the farmer hoped to quintuple his harvest this year.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits quintupled after launching a new product line.
meanings.sent3: When the magician waved his wand, the rabbit started quintupling in size!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was quintupling with each step closer to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The balloons kept quintupling in number, filling the room with colors.

meanings.definition: The act of multiplying by five.
meanings.sent1: The quintupling of the recipe resulted in a delicious feast for the family.
meanings.sent2: She was amazed by the quintupling of her savings over the past year.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected quintupling of the number of guests made her scramble for more chairs.
meanings.sent4: The quintupling of stars in the night sky took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The quintupling of the population in the small town brought new challenges to the community.
